title: Woman Within Women's Plus Size Velour Pant
features: PLUS SIZING: Size Medium will fit Plus sizes 14 to 16
Your favorite pant is even better (and more comfy) in plush velour. Designed with an elastic waistband and side seam pockets, it pairs perfectly with every tunic or long top.

ABOUT THE BRAND: At Woman Within we’re the experts in plus size comfort, and we’ve been doing this for over 100 years. No surprise then that we’re one of the go-to brands in the plus-size clothing industry for incredible fit and of-the-moment style. Our goal is to make sure you always feel great and look good in our comfortable clothes in all the colors you love.
